MaxAroma: Welcome! Your $10 OFF coupon code is TEXT10 - click here to shop now: maxaroma.attn.tv/avHfO_vMys34 
- Applies to Orders of $110+
- Exclusions May Apply To Above Code
- Don't forget to join AROMA CLUB to earn points!

MaxAroma: Let's tailor your offers.
What type of fragrances do you love most?

Reply 1 for Niche
Reply 2 for Designer
Reply 3 for I love trying new scents

MaxAroma: Members, your rewards are unlocked! Enjoy exclusive savings on your favorite fragrances: 

- Extra $10 OFF $120+ (VDAY10)
- Extra $30 OFF $280+ (VDAY30)
- Extra $100 OFF $750+ (VDAY100)

Treat yourself to something special today! ends 2/11
maxaroma.attn.tv/aBDaxcS-aGxl

MaxAroma: Hey there, this is Sarah. Thanks for checking out our site! üòä https://maxaroma.attn.tv/aGt_U_nC4dDB 

Any questions I can answer for you?
I don't get an option for the $10 discount code when I check out

MaxAroma: Thanks for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear about this. VDAY10 is a promo code that needs to be entered at checkout. Once your cart subtotal is at least $120 with eligible items, you can apply the code in the "Promo Code" field during checkout, and the discount will be reflected before payment.

If you've already tried entering it and it didn't apply, it usually means one of two things:

The cart total hasn't reached the $120 minimum.

Some items aren't part of the eligible collection linked in the offer.

In those cases, adjusting the cart to meet the requirements should allow the code to work. Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for post purchase issues, use PPI shortcut
promo_and_exclusions: Only one code can be used per order. Multiple orders will need to be placed to optimize multiple offers
Do NOT offer codes during sales and promotions!
When sending a discount code to the customer - always add "the code is valid on orders over XX. Exclusions may apply"

escalation_preferences: Discount adjustments to orders, please see template provided

I need it delivered by 02-19

Newton: Thanks for reaching out! Unfortunately, I don't see any active orders on my end. Could you please check if you received a confirmation email or if there's a charge on your account? Sometimes the email might arrive in your spam or promo folder, so be sure to take a look there too! 

Also, please note that all Newton products have a processing time of 1-3 business days. Our partner products like cribs, dressers, and Figgy products can take up to 5 days before shipping out.

Please let me know how I can assist you further today, I'm just a text away!
I need one of your mattresses by Thursday.

Template used: "Can I order now and have you hold the items for a future delivery date?"; last updated: 2023-10-02 21:55:47.180

Newton: Got it. However, all Newton products have a processing time of 1-3 business days. Our partner products like cribs, dressers, and Figgy products can take up to 5 days before shipping out. Once the order is placed, we will ship the items in approximately 1-2 business days, after its available ship date. Orders will arrive in 4-12 business days once they are shipped. Hope this helps.

send_to_cs: No escalations for this client, send to CS using the Support templates
For post-purchase inquiries send to CS using the Support template (shortcut: ESC)
‚ûú If the cx is having difficulties sending an email to CS via the link in the ESC temp - use Support 2 template (shortcut: TESC)
‚ûú If the cx is facing technical website issues while accessing the link, do NOT immediately send the TESC shortcut, troubleshoot first instead
For pre-purchase inquiries send to CS using the Support 2 template (shortcut: TESC)
tone: üÖøÔ∏è Use wording that is in line with the brand's voice and terminology found on the website
‚ûú e.g. Nova Kids, Nova Babes, Insta-worthy, slays, snatched, baddie, etc.
‚ûú Always look up the term's meaning before using it!
templates: For expired discounts use EXP shortcut
For login issues use LGI shortcut
promo_and_exclusions: If cx are looking for their 30% welcome code, ask to check their email (spam & promo)
Gift cards can be used on discounted items

send_to_cs: If escalated do NOT send to CS
escalate: ESC if a cx wants to purchase an out of stock item
ESC if cx want someone from the cs team to call them directly
ESC when a cx asks for a call back
ESC if uncertain about refills or product specific questions
ESC if cx has issues registering
ESC if cx asks for help putting through an order
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Don't use too many exclamation points
Use more formal language such as "Hello" instead of "Hey"
Avoid responding to anything related to politics
dos_and_donts: Always use your VPN when accessing their website & make sure you're sending US links
Don't ever release information on personnel related to the company
Don't share any authorized retailers, only boutiques
Don't ask cx to leave product reviews as they don't collect them
drive_to_purchase: When D2P'ing, do not send links of the search results page, send either a related collection or product page
